headline: Sodexo | Roth Looks to be Good Partner to Ultium Cells
sentences: Again, just that overall facility management; to be a good partner within the organization for Ultium and building that relationship as they expand here in Ohio,” says Sheppard.
YOUNGSTOWN, Ohio — U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan, D-13 Ohio, joined Sodexo | Roth officials and Sheet Metal Workers Local 33 members on a tour of the factory.
Rick Sheppard, vice president of Sodexo | Roth says the company looks to be a good partner to Ultium Cells in Lordstown.
“They’re coming from Korea and basically they need a friend near the area.
